ygData.subject: Re: Executioners Axe
ygData.msgSnippet: Now think about your answer for a second.. If that were the case it came from crush himself i think there would be a HELL of a lot more people with the axe and
ygData.messageBody:
Now think about your answer for a second.. If that were the case it came
from crush himself i think there would be a HELL of a lot more people with
the axe and even a HELL of a lot more for sale. For some reason i just
think that was a stupid post on your part

On Wed, 19 May 1999, Zwanenburg,
John wrote:

> From: "Zwanenburg, John" <ZWANENJ@...>
>
> WRONG WRONG WRONG!
>
> Folks, lemme set this straight, from what ive heard from good sources....the
> execiutioners axe is found either through a quest by killing Crushbone
> himself, of by looting it off his body, its stats ARE 25 damage, 50 speed
> BUT it casts a haste spell which brings the speed all the way down to 25!!!
> now thats speed!
>
> If you want to know where to get it for sure, go check the gameznet EQ site
> John Zwanenburg
> Tips Support/Support Sipt
> Tel: (613) 998-2745
>
